title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 August 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:59 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
01:38 <polx> has quit  
04:06 <CIA-114> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r0ed7726 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0ed7726525db77ebedca2c772a7dd5fdd8dbce78 / xwiki-platform-core/pom.xml : XWIKI-8106: iText library wrongly pulled in as a transitive dependency of JFreeChart - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0ed7726525db77ebedca2c772a7dd5fdd8dbce78

09:09 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <npst> has joined #xwiki  
09:54 <npst> morning  
09:55 <npst> sooo... i'm planning to set up a wiki using xwiki/tomcat and oracle on two different machines and was wondering about the recommended specifications as in ram and disk space.  
09:56 <npst> the wiki will likely have some four digit amount of pages, few pictures saved in the file system and no other files uploaded  
09:56 <npst> what would be some good guesses?  
10:03 <npst> ah, OS will be debian, that might matter  
10:38 <npst> now if only mflorea was online and able to help me ... :)  
10:41 <+mflorea> I am online, but unfortunately I don't know what are the recommended system requirements. I use the default jetty+hsqldb for my dev so I didn't have to install XWiki on Tomcat+Oracle so far..  
10:45 <npst> ah, too bad. well, maybe someone else will answer some time later.. i'll tab away for now  
10:45 <npst> thanks  
10:45 <+mflorea> npst: I could find only this http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Installation#HPrerequisites  
10:45 <+mflorea> yoa mail on users list  
10:46 <+mflorea> sorry, I meant you should ask this on the users mailing list  
10:49 <npst> has quit

15:17 <+sburjan> Hello. I get this when installing workspaces. dunno if it is ok or not.  
15:17 <+sburjan> 2012-08-02 16:11:04,105 [http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/WorkspaceManager/Install] WARN  o.h.d.f.TemplateRenderer       - Function template anticipated 4 arguments, but 3 arguments encountered  
15:17 <+sburjan> 2012-08-02 16:11:04,105 [http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/WorkspaceManager/Install] WARN  o.h.d.f.TemplateRenderer       - Function template anticipated 4 arguments, but 3 arguments encountered  
15:19 <CIA-114> tmortagne stable-3.5.x \* recd330b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/ecd330b4f935071aebe3b39eeff6882ab7676760 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/XWiki.java : XWIKI-7142: Can not programatically delete a document located on a diferent wiki than the current one. - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/ecd330b4f935071aebe3b39eeff6882ab7676760  
15:20 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* r21cb82a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/21cb82a9619182d4e17a0dd83ace3c866a01576a / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/XWiki.java : XWIKI-7142: Can not programatically delete a document located on a diferent wiki than the current one. - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/21cb82a9619182d4e17a0dd83ace3c866a01576a  
15:20 <CIA-114> tmortagne stable-4.0.x \* r0aceed5 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0aceed5cc336378c020b0dc22b5462861229b49d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/XWiki.java : XWIKI-7142: Can not programatically delete a document located on a diferent wiki than the current one. - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0aceed5cc336378c020b0dc22b5462861229b49d

18:03 <mflorea> has quit  
18:04 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* r8bd0a79 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/8bd0a7958bfaec524450ffa4c52ead53ef2271c2 / (3 files in 3 dirs): XWIKI-8112: In some condition the log is badly printed - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/8bd0a7958bfaec524450ffa4c52ead53ef2271c2  
18:05 <@cjd> Denis: do you know why somebody would be getting a "can't use unmigrated database" error but not getting any errors about migration?  
18:05 <@cjd> http://pastebin.com/U4VaVTQw

18:17 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki

18:17 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
18:19 <+Denis> cjd: is migration enabled ?  
18:20 <@cjd> he says it is  
18:20 <@cjd> it's on the user's list  
18:20 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
18:20 <polx\_> has quit  
18:20 <@cjd> [xwiki-users] Problem Migrating Database from XWiki Ent 3.5.1 to 4.1.3 for MSSQL  
18:20 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
18:23 <polx> has quit  
18:23 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
18:27 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
18:28 <@cjd> Denis: if you're responding to his mail, note that sburjan just told me that MSSQL is not officially supported so this is not really a bug..  
18:28 <+Denis> cjd: I see xwiki.store.migration.databases twice, none is require  
18:29 <+Denis> and yes, we have never tested MSSQL, but this interesting to know if it works or not  
18:29 <+Denis> actually, it seems it does not try to migrate at all  
18:29 <@cjd> indeed, that's why I was asking about it  
18:29 <+Denis> so it should be an issue in configuration IMO  
18:30 <@cjd> perhaps we should add a patch to explain in the error message that the user should enable migration in their conf file  
18:30 <+sburjan> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/resources/xwiki.mssql.hbm.xml  
18:30 <+sburjan> this is very obsolete  
18:31 <polx> has quit  
18:31 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
18:31 <+sburjan> last commit is yours Denis :)  
18:31 <@cjd> another idea is to log an ERROR in the tomcat log if the database is not supported  
18:31 <+Denis> sburjan: why do you say it is obsolete ?  
18:31 <+sburjan> because I remember when we decided which database to support, Vincent told me that mssql and derby hbm files are obsolete, and since we don't support them, we should even remove them  
18:32 <+Denis> I was not aware, and I have updated them, like any other, but this is obviously untested  
18:33 <+Denis> but at first look, the hbm you mention does not seems too me so outdated  
18:33 <+sburjan> yes, not tested since a long time  
18:33 <@cjd> it hurts to drop support for something since we can't really offer people any way of migrating to a supported system  
18:34 <+sburjan> well .. you might be right, but wh had a lot of migration issues since 4.0 and I don't think that your fix makes it fully usable  
18:34 <+sburjan> but untill not tested, I cannot say anything  
18:34 <+Denis> cjd: do you want me to follow up on the mail, or do you continue with it ?  
18:35 <@cjd> you can follow it up, perhaps he has added a migration=0 somewhere else in the file  
18:37 <+Denis> sburjan: not that the guy on list says that an empty DB works for him  
18:37 <+Denis> s/not/note  
18:37 <+sburjan> yes, I've seen  
18:37 <+Denis> we obviously cannot predict for the migration  
18:38 <+Denis> but seems that hbm are not so bad  
18:39 <+sburjan> well we changed some data types for postgres and Oracle . I remember sdumitriu did that, but AFAIK he didn't touched the mssql, so there are some things which still fail I guess  
18:39 <+sburjan> talking about migrations  
18:40 <@sdumitriu> Do we even have a mapping file for mssql officially?  
18:40 <+sburjan> well we have the one from oldcore, but Vincent told me it's unmaintained. Same as the one for Derby  
18:40 <@cjd> you guys use eclipse? I'm importing all of the code and there are a bunch of errors like "No marketplace entries found to handle maven-dependency-plugin:2.4:copy in Eclipse.  Please see Help for more information" do I just skip over them?  
18:41 <+sburjan> I'm not a db expert, nor hibernate, so you guys know better. I'm just saying what I know :)  
18:42 <polx> has quit  
18:42 <@sdumitriu> cjd: That was recently discussed on the list  
18:42 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
18:43 <@cjd> found it, reading
